word:
Appetite Denied for Funds to the Church 
     I then saw the appetite must be denied, that rich food should not be prepared, and that which is lavished upon the appetite should be put in the 


                                    -83- 

treasury of the Lord.--Ms 1, 1854, p. 7. ("Reproof for Adultery and Neglect of Children," February 12, 1854.) 

Released November 13, 1973.
